review: Augmentin (amoxicillin / clavulanate):Augmentin caused severe neurological issues with my mother where she exhibited stroke systems without having one and was very lethargic and lacked motor function.   My father became very nauseous with severe headaches.   I don't know why this drug is pushed on elderly people and want to tell everyone to beware of it!
Had Pneumonia for 10 days, took Augmentin 875/125, felt better in 5 days. The only side effects were nausea and diarrhea for 2 days.
